short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows exporting of birthdays from Snapchat to your calendar (ICAL format)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily export all the birthdays you care about!
Remember to leave a review and uninstall when you're done with Snap2Calendar!

This extension is in no way affiliated with Snap Inc.
